column4: hi all, I've used Ubuntu for a while in the past, but today I tried to install Natty 11.04 on a gateway t-1616 and it's been painful. I got the black screen of death after I booted from my usb stick, but I didn't give up and tried with nomodeset as kernel parameter getting a initramfs prompt telling me /init:line 7: can't open udevadm sttle-timeout of 180 seconds reached. Help could be really really great.
sounds like a bug particular only to your hardware, what computer and model do you have?
I'll try with the alternate installer.
